mapper.insert: insert into assignment_list (title, course_id, teacher_id, due_date, resubmission_allowed, accept_resubmission_until, requirements, attachment) values (#{title}, #{course_id}, #{teacher_id}, #{due_date}, #{resubmission_allowed}, #{accept_resubmission_until}, #{requirements}, #{attachment})
mapper.update: update assignment_list set title=#{title}, course_id=#{course_id}, teacher_id=#{teacher_id}, due_date=#{due_date}, resubmission_allowed=#{resubmission_allowed}, accept_resubmission_until=#{accept_resubmission_until}, requirements=#{requirements}, attachment=#{attachment} where id = #{assignment_id};
